name: Game#9-GameJamGameDevelopment
description:
Click on the balls to destroy them. You get score for getting the green balls as well as for destroying "distraction balls" - the ones with letter on them. Destroy those before they hit you. Red balls are bugs which lowers your score so avoid those.

Made by: me :D

All sounds and graphics are self made. 

Week9: 15.10-20.10.2018  

Constraints:  Theme - Game Development

Core Dynamic: Clicking on balls before they are gone

Summary: I wanted to make a game where a procedurally generated song is created and you have to click on the balls within the rhythm. Unfortunately on Friday I had only base drums track and l couldn't figure it out so I ended up doing a simple click before its gone game.

What went bad: I have wasted whole Friday and made the game from 5 am Saturday to the deadline. I need a way to stay motivated and work when there is time and not on the last day - as i usually do.

What went good: I believe I have created something original - or maybe not but the point is I have created it myself and not reused from something I have seen before. So all in all I am happy about it :)
